narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Concepts Inc. is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Dumfries, VA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $63.6M in Medicaid payments across 32K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $63.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
